title: Latam Insights — Honduras Opens Public CBDC Consultation, Venezuela Applies to Enter BRICS
description: Welcome to Latam Insights, a compendium of Latin America’s most relevant crypto and economic news during the last week. In this issue: Honduras opens a central bank digital currency (CBDC) consultation, Venezuela applies officially to join BRICS, and Trubit launches Pix payment integration in Brazil.
